location.title: Location
location.mapPlaceholder: Tap "Get Current Location" to view your position
location.infoText: Click "Get Current Location" to sync your GPS location, then click "Set Home Location" to save it.
location.permissionDeniedMessage: Location permission is required to get your current location.
location.locationErrorMessage: Unable to get your location. Please make sure location services are enabled.
location.noLocationSelectedMessage: Please get your current location first before setting it as home location.
location.homeLocationSetMessage: Your home location has been set.

help.title: Help & Support
help.faq1Answer:
To withdraw money:
1. Go to your Profile
2. Click on "Withdraw Funds"
3. Enter the amount (minimum ‚Çπ100)
4. Select your bank account
5. Confirm the withdrawal

Money will be transferred within 24-48 hours.
help.faq2Answer:
To get more work:
1. Complete your profile 100%
2. Add skills and portfolio images
3. Set competitive rates
4. Enable location services
5. Keep availability updated
6. Maintain high ratings

Higher ratings = More visibility!
help.faq3Answer:
To schedule non-working days:
1. Go to your Profile
2. Click "Availability Calendar"
3. Select dates you're unavailable
4. Add reason (optional)
5. Save changes

Clients won't see you on blocked dates.
help.faq4Question: How TO Get Help From AI ?
help.faq4Answer:
To get AI help:
1. Click the AI button (bottom-right)
2. Type your question
3. AI will respond instantly

AI can help with:
‚Ä¢ Withdrawals
‚Ä¢ Getting work
‚Ä¢ Scheduling
‚Ä¢ Bank setup
‚Ä¢ Referrals
‚Ä¢ And more!
help.faq5Question: How To Set Primary Bank Account ?
help.faq5Answer:
To set primary bank account:
1. Go to Settings
2. Click "Bank Accounts"
3. Click "Add Bank Account"
4. Enter bank details
5. Click "Set as Primary"

You can add multiple accounts and switch primary anytime.
